source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_SEQ_00<tab>Drusilla seems relieved to see you walk through her door unscathed.
target: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_SEQ_00<tab>レムレースのオフィスのドルシラは、冒険者を気にかけているようだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_SEQ_01<tab>While pleased to see you safe, Drusilla informs you that members of the family throughout Thanalan have reported disturbing sightings. That, along with a blunted dagger delivered to Lemures headquarters as a threat, has put everyone on edge. She suggests investigating the claims, both to gather potentially useful information and to escape from her quarters for a spell. You are to speak with family at Black Brush Station, from where one of the reports originated.
target: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_SEQ_01<tab>レムレースのファミリーたちは、オルクスの影に怯えているようだ。見回りのため、中央ザナラーンのブラックブラッシュ停留所で「レムレースの構成員」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_SEQ_02<tab>Though the first of the Lemures you approach has witnessed nothing unusual of late, he speaks at length and shares the story of his exile from Garlemald. He also tells you of a young woman who claims to have seen frightening images in the sands, and instructs you to visit Lost Hope if you wish to hear her delusions.
target: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_SEQ_02<tab>レムレースの構成員から様子を聞いた。中央ザナラーンのロストホープ流民街で「品の良さそうな女性」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_SEQ_03<tab>The woman is much more level-headed than you were led to believe, but still shaken by her recent experiences. After you introduce yourself as a friend of Drusilla, she regales you with the tale of how she and her beloved fled Garlemald, displaying an eagerness to divulge personal details that appears oddly common amongst the Lemures. She then informs you that it was not her, but her beloved who spied the dread figure in the desert, and begs you to ask him for further details─and, if you are able, bring an end to the vile menace.
target: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_SEQ_03<tab>品の良さそうな女性と話した。彼女の夫が「青ざめた男」を見たようだ。中央ザナラーンのクラッチ狭間で「長身の伊達男」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_SEQ_04<tab>You interrupt a slender man engaged in the sacred act of poetic creation. Whether it is because the verses he recites are divine or dreadful is unclear, but regardless, a voidsent reveals itself as the final rhyme is released unto the desert wind. The poet is helpless before the otherworldly beast, leaving the butchery in your hands.
target: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_SEQ_04<tab>長身の伊達男と話していると、妖異が現れた。クラッチ狭間で「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F22B1301 /var>」を倒そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_SEQ_05<tab>You dispatch the threat, which refrains from giving its opinion on the poet's latest masterpiece. The flustered artist appears unharmed and regards you in stunned awe. Perhaps the sound of your voice will awaken him from his stupor─or failing that, a powerful nod.
target: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_SEQ_05<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F22B1301 /var>を倒した。クラッチ狭間で「長身の伊達男」と話そう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_SEQ_06<tab>The man thanks you profusely before reporting that it was during a similar excursion into the desert that he saw the man with pale skin and blood red eyes. The enigmatic figure returned his gaze with unnerving silence and an ominous grin before vanishing. While it is uncertain if this was Orcus or not, the poet recognizes that the desert is no place for feats of lyricism, and returns to the uncritical arms of his beloved, marking the end of your duty there.
target: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_SEQ_06<tab>長身の伊達男から「青ざめた男」の話を聞いた。中央ザナラーンのストーンズスロー貧民窟で「ドルシラ」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_SEQ_07Drusilla listens to your story with concern and praises you for slaying the voidsent before anyone came to harm. She then asks for your thoughts on the disparate members of the Lemures before speaking of how all fled their homeland of Garlemald. She goes on to recount her own experiences at length, telling the story of her grandfather Rullus's failed assassination of Solus zos Galvus, and his subsequent pursuit of power that led to his possession by Orcus and her flight to Eorzea. While the memories are plainly not easy for her to recall, her willingness to share is proof that she has come to think of you as a member of her found family. Tired from the day's work, she bids you return to headquarters.

※You may re-enter Lemures headquarters by speaking with the loyal Lemure in Pearl Lane.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_SEQ_07ドルシラから、過去の話を聞いた。皇帝ソルの暗殺を企てたドルシラの祖父は返り討ちに遭い、力を求めた結果、アヴァターの制御に失敗。オルクスに肉体を乗っ取られ、家族を皆殺しにしていた。ドルシラはそのとき、半身である自身のアヴァターが身代わりに喰われたことで、死なずに済んだのだという。「レムレースのオフィス」に戻ろう。
一度外に出た場合は、パールレーンにいる「レムレースの構成員」に話しかけると、案内してくれるようだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_SEQ_08<tab>Although Orcus did not show himself during your investigations into the family's claims, Drusilla seems certain that he will act soon─and that she will be his chosen target. No sooner does she share this intuition than Orcus appears, scythe poised to remove her head from her shoulders. Though titillated by the hatred and fear he sees smoldering within you, he yearns to see his meal grow even more flavorful, and to that end declares that he will torture Drusilla at his leisure, all the while waiting for your soul to attain its full delicious potential. With those parting words, Orcus returns to the shadows whence he came, leaving you and Hermin alone in Drusilla's chambers. The gobsmacked girl looks as if she could use some comforting words, or perhaps an outlet for her rising anger.
target: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_SEQ_08<tab>レムレースのオフィスに現れたオルクスに、ドルシラが連れ去られてしまった。冒険者の恐怖と憎悪を掻き立ててから、その魂を喰らうつもりのようだ。レムレースのオフィスの「ヘルミン」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_SEQ_09After Hermin's rage subsides, your next course of action becomes clear: rescue Drusilla from Orcus's clutches at all costs. His whereabouts are as uncertain as ever, but Hermin plans on pooling the resources of the family to make a concerted effort to ascertain them. In the meantime, you must keep your skills sharp, for only a reaper can cut Orcus down.

※The next reaper quest will be available from Hermin upon reaching level 80.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_SEQ_09ヘルミンは、ほかの構成員たちと協力してドルシラの行方を捜すつもりのようだ。報告を待つ間、腕を磨いてオルクスとの決戦に備えよう。

※リーパーのレベルが80以上になると、レムレースのオフィスのヘルミンから次のリーパークエストを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the loyal Lemure at Black Brush Station.
target: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_TODO_00<tab>ブラックブラッシュ停留所のレムレースの構成員と話す

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the elegant woman.
target: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_TODO_01<tab>品の良さそうな女性と話す

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the lithe dandy.
target: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_TODO_02<tab>長身の伊達男と話す

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_TODO_03<tab>Defeat the bloodsupped voidsent.
target: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_TODO_03<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F22B1301 /var>を討伐

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_TODO_04<tab>Speak with the lithe dandy.
target: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_TODO_04<tab>長身の伊達男と話す

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Drusilla in Stonesthrow.
target: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_TODO_05<tab>ドルシラと話す

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_TODO_06<tab>Enter Lemures headquarters.
target: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_TODO_06<tab>レムレースのオフィスに向かう

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_TODO_07<tab>Speak with Hermin.
target: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_TODO_07<tab>ヘルミンと話す

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_HERMIN_000_001<tab>If the boss says you're family, then you're family. Let's put that bastard in the dirt, eh? For Arnegis.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_HERMIN_000_001ボスが、アンタのことをファミリーの一員に等しいって、
そう認めたんなら、アタイもそう思うことにするよ。
いっしょに協力して、おっさんの仇を討とう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_010<tab>Glad to see Orcus hasn't sunk his teeth into you yet, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Don't go thinkin' he's given up on tryin', though.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_010)) (( )) 02 /var>か……
その後、異常はないかい？

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_011<tab>He's out there, savorin' you from a distance. Can't resist checkin' in on his prize, just as he can't resist seekin' out morsels to tide him over till his feast. The reports we've received of a man pale as death skulking about the sands is proof of that.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_011ふむ、オルクスは現れていないと……
こっちはと言えば、オルクスの影がちらほら見え隠れしていてね。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_HERMIN_000_012<tab>And then there's the matter of this blunted dagger. We don't know who sent it, but we do know what it means.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_HERMIN_000_012ファミリーの何人かが「青ざめた男」を見たと言っている。
それから、差出人は不明だけど「刃を潰した短剣」が、
届けられたって報告もある。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_013<tab>It's a warnin' commonly used by the less savory elements in Ul'dah. A warnin' that the next will be delivered sharp and straight to our bellies.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_013「刃を潰した短剣」は、ウルダハ裏社会における暗喩のひとつでね。
次は本物の短剣を届ける、腹を刺して殺してやるって意味さ。
しょうもない脅しをしやがって……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_HERMIN_000_014<tab>More fool them. They've no notion of what we've faced and lived, thinking we'd soil our smallclothes over empty threats.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_HERMIN_000_014ボスや)) (( )) 02 /var>は、
これっぽっちも動揺してないみたいだけどさ。
ファミリーの中には、震え上がっちまってるヤツも少なくないよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_015<tab>Let's hope it's nothin' more than that, lass, seein' as we need to follow up on those reports sooner than later. Anyone fancy a bit of fresh air? If we catch a whiff of Orcus's foul stench, all the better...
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_015やれやれ、仕方ない。
アタシらで、少しばかり見回りでもするかね。
「レムレース」ファミリーに関わる連中を訪ねてやるのさ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_016<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I want you to ask around near Black Brush Station, and I'll head to Stonesthrow. When you're done, meet me there and we'll share what we've dug up.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_016お前さんは中央ザナラーンのブラックブラッシュ周辺を頼む。
アタシは、ストーンズスロー貧民窟の方を回るから、
終わったら合流しとくれ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_HERMIN_000_020<tab>Not every member of the family has the means or the inclination to live in the jewel of the desert. Some settle for something with a little less luster.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_HERMIN_000_020「レムレース」ファミリーの構成員には、
ウルダハ都市内に住まいを買えていない連中も多いんだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERA_000_030<tab>I recognize that self-assured stride. The mark of a <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> ready to take on the world and then some. You must be the Eorzean reaper the boss sent word about.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERA_000_030む、その出で立ちは……
ボスが言っていたエオルゼア人のリーパーか？

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERA_000_031<tab>I'm almost disappointed to tell you nothing is amiss. The soldier in me would've loved to see a reaper in action. I once fought in the imperial army, though you wouldn't think it to look at me now.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERA_000_031変わったことは特に起こっていないし、動揺もしていないさ。
あまり大きな声では言えないが、これでも元帝国軍人なんでね。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERA_000_032<tab>I served proudly under Lord Valens in my youth, until the day he ordered us to use commonfolk as fodder in some pointless skirmish. I refused, and was sentenced to death for my candor. Needless to say, I didn't keep that appointment.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERA_000_032その昔、ウァレンスって名の将校の部下だったんだが、
属州人を盾に使うように命令されてな……。
反発した結果、処刑されそうになって脱走してきたのさ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERA_000_033<tab>Compared to that evil, toothless threats and ghosts are no bother. But the less jaded are more excitable─one lass in particular has been jumping at shadows.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERA_000_033あの修羅場に比べたら、脅し程度、屁でもねぇ。
ただ……最近、ファミリーに加わった若いのが、
「青ざめた男」を見たと言って怯えていたな。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERA_000_034<tab>She claims to have seen all manner of terrors, but I suspect she'd be startled by her own reflection. Still, if you want to lend an ear to her delusions, you can find her in Lost Hope.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERA_000_034今の時間ならロストホープ流民街に、そいつのツレがいるはずだ。
この辺りじゃ珍しい「品の良さそうな女性」だから、
心配なら声をかけてやってくれ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERA_000_040<tab>Things are quiet in these parts, save for that lass telling anyone who'll listen about the things she's seen in the dark. Find her in Lost Hope if you're in the mood for a bone-chilling yarn.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERA_000_040今の時間ならロストホープ流民街に、そいつのツレがいるはずだ。
この辺りじゃ珍しい「品の良さそうな女性」だから、
心配なら声をかけてやってくれ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERB_000_050<tab>Aaah! Oh...hello. Who are you?
target: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERB_000_050<tab>あ、あの……何かご用でしょうか？

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERB_000_051<tab>Oh! Did Drusilla receive my missive? She's sent someone to rid us of this terrible evil waiting in the wings?
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERB_000_051まぁ！
ドルシラさんが私たちを心配して、
あなたを寄越してくださったの？

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERB_000_052<tab>Truly, she cares for us as if we really were her flesh and blood─which is more than I can say about my own. Not once have I longed to return to the life of comfort I left behind in Garlemald, and I have Drusilla to thank for that.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERB_000_052本当に嬉しいわ……。
ダーリンが「青ざめた男」を見たって話していて、
心の底から震え上がっていたのよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERB_000_053<tab>She isn't the reason I left home in the first place, of course. Had I not met my beloved, I would likely still be feasting on lemoncakes in ignorance.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERB_000_053私ね、これでも帝国では貴族として、
それなりの地位で暮らしていたのよ……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERB_000_054<tab>In ignorance of love, of freedom. I found the former in Garlemald, and the latter in Eorzea, as our new life blossomed into something beautiful.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERB_000_054でも、ダーリンと出会って人生が変わったわ。
愛と自由を求めて祖国を離れ、こうして異郷の地で再出発したの。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERB_000_055<tab>Not every day has been easy. Not even most days. But Drusilla's watchful eye has kept us safe, and our freedom is worth any measure of hardship.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERB_000_055ここでの暮らしぶりは厳しいけれど、
ドルシラさんのように護ってくれる方もいるし、
自由があるから頑張れているわ……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERB_000_056<tab>Such terrible fear gripped my heart when my beloved told me of the pale man he spied on the sands. But now that the family has come to help, I can breathe a sigh of relief.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERB_000_056聞けば「青ざめた男」は、殺人鬼なんでしょう？
私たちの未来が脅かされていると思うと、恐ろしくって……。
でも、「レムレース」ファミリーがいるなら安心よね！

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERB_000_057<tab>I'm sure you wish to know precisely where to find that horrid creature, but I cannot help half so well as my beloved might. Seek him in the southeast, and pray put an end to this nightmare!
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERB_000_057「青ざめた男」について、もっと詳しい話が聞きたいなら、
南東の川を渡った先にいるダーリンに声をかけてみて。
「長身の伊達男」だから、すぐわかるはずよ！

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERB_000_060<tab>The mere thought of that pallid skin sets my heart racing in terror. Seek out my beloved so we may finally put paid to this menace. He should be just southeast of here, seeking inspiration for his latest masterpiece.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERB_000_060「青ざめた男」について、もっと詳しい話が聞きたいなら、
南東の川を渡った先にいるダーリンに声をかけてみて。
「長身の伊達男」だから、すぐわかるはずよ！

source:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERC_000_070Through deviled mists the hunter doth now tread,
Tracking the scent of quarry others dread,
In darkest night cry for a keeper,
Lo, by your side walks, the reaper.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERC_000_070嗚呼、その背にあるは、魂の狩人たる証……！
我が怖れを払うため、夜闇とともに舞い降りん……！

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERC_000_071<tab>Ah, apologies for the effusive display, friend. I'm a poet, you see, and cannot resist putting into words the flood of emotions that accompany such a striking figure as yours.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERC_000_071おっと、すまない。
僕は詩人でね、ついつい心から湧き上がる感動を言葉に……

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERC_000_072<tab>Ack! A... A...m-m-m...
target: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERC_000_072<tab>で、で、で……

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERC_000_073<tab>Monster!!!
target: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERC_000_073<tab>でたぁ～！

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_ORCUSBEHAVER_000_074<tab>Graaaaaagh!
target: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_ORCUSBEHAVER_000_074<tab>フシュゥゥゥゥ……！

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_SYSTEM_000_075<tab>The bloodlust emanating from this voidsent is potent and powerful...
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_SYSTEM_000_075いつの間にか現れていた妖異が殺気を放っている。
「血に飢えた妖異」を倒そう……！

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERC_000_090<tab>Thank you, thank you, thank you! My savior, my godssend!
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERC_000_090はひっ、はひっ……た、たすかったよ……！
君は、まさしく命の恩人だ！

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERC_000_091<tab>Would that I could have aided you, but alas, a poet's pen is of little use in battle.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERC_000_091先程も言ったように、僕は詩人でね。
物理的な戦いはさっぱりなんだ……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERC_000_092<tab>Unless, of course, that battle involves not swords and scythes, but words! Just ask the sire of my beloved, who is even now licking the wounds dealt by the invective verse I composed after he had the gall to forbid our union!
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERC_000_092とはいえ、言葉での戦いには自信があるよ。
結婚に反対した彼女の父親を、想像力の限りを尽くして、
侮蔑する詩を発表したんだが……その効果と来たら絶大でね！

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERC_000_093<tab>A masterwork of scathing metaphor and subtle remonstration! Alas, for all their pretensions, nobles are anything but subtle in their rage. We were forced to flee, to abandon our homes with only our love for sustenance.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERC_000_093まぁ、高位貴族を激怒させたことで、
帝国で暮らすことができなくなったわけだけど……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERC_000_094<tab>Nevertheless, I've regretted not a single moment of our life in exile. In Eorzea we found an unexpected treasure: freedom. Freedom of mind and freedom of heart.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERC_000_094それでも今は幸せさ。
エオルゼアには、ガレマール帝国にはない自由がある。
創作を阻む者もいなければ、愛を阻む者もいないんだからね。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERC_000_095<tab>Ah, but I digress. Surely you did not seek me out simply to save my life and leave with a nod and a smile. Did you wish to commission a poem?
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERC_000_095それで、我が恩人よ。
僕にいったい何の用が……？

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERC_000_096<tab>The pale man? Aye, I encountered him whilst wandering these arid wastes in search of inspiration. I felt the gaze of some terrible presence upon my back, and when I turned to meet it, he was standing there, grinning like a butcher in a bullpen.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERC_000_096「青ざめた男」について聞きたい、と……？
あれは、僕が詩想を巡らせながら荒野を歩いていた時のこと。
ふと視線を感じて振り向いた時、薄ら笑いの男と目があったんだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERC_000_097<tab>He wore robes much too thick for these scorched sands, and his skin looked as if it had never been kissed by the blazing sun. Worst of all, his eyes were as two bottomless pools of blood. I feared my end had come, but then he vanished as quickly as he had appeared.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERC_000_097ザナラーンには似合わない黒い衣、
妙に青白い肌に、血のように紅い瞳……恐ろしかったね。
だが、次の瞬間には、霞のように消えてしまった……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERC_000_098<tab>Perhaps I've been reckless. Recent incidents make it clear that the cost of inspiration is higher than I'm willing to pay. I shall return to my beloved, for both my safety and hers. Thank you again, my savior.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_LEMURESMEMBERC_000_098僕に話せるのはここまでだ。
今回の一件で、荒野をひとりで出歩くのは危険だと確信したよ。
愛する人のところに戻って、しばらくは大人しくしているさ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_100<tab>There you are. And?
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_100戻ってきたね……。
そっちは、どうだった？

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_101<tab>Another one of his accursed minions. Well, I suppose we can take comfort in the fact that none of the family came to harm, yourself included. Well done.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_101なるほど……妖異に襲われた、と……。
ひとまず、お前さんも伊達男も無事だったようでなによりだよ。
よくやってくれた。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_102<tab>Speaking of which, what do you think of this family you've been thrust into? Speak freely─I haven't lived this long by takin' offense at opinions I don't want to hear.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_102なあ、)) (( )) 02 /var>……
「レムレース」ファミリーに関わる連中を見て、どう感じた？
率直な想いを聞かせてくれないか？

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_Q1_000_000<tab>何と答える？

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_A1_000_001<tab>I'm surprised you've all survived this long.
target: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_A1_000_001<tab>理解できなかった

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_A1_000_002<tab>Seems like any other family to me.
target: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_A1_000_002<tab>普通の人々のように感じた

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_A1_000_003<tab>Doesn't matter what I think, does it?
target: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_A1_000_003<tab>興味がない

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_104<tab>Takes more than brute strength for folks to survive. None of them were fit for life under the Empire's boot, and that's good enough for me.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_104理解できない、か……。
たしかに、どいつもこいつも帝国の中じゃ、はみ出し者だ。
常識はずれの事をしでかして、故郷を追われちまったんだからね。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_105<tab>Hah! Seen some odd families then, I reckon. I'd like to think we're one of a kind, though. A collection of castoffs unfit to live under the Empire's boot. Yours truly included.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_105普通、か……。
それは、アタシらにとっちゃ、褒め言葉さ。
どいつもこいつも帝国の中じゃ、はみ出し者だったんだからね。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_106<tab>If you say so. I reckon you don't hate us, and that's good enough for me. End of the day, we're just a ragtag band of outcasts unfit to live under the Empire's boot. Yours truly included.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_106興味がない、か……。
少なくとも敵ではないと思ってくれているなら、問題ないさ。
どいつもこいつも帝国の中じゃ、はみ出し者だったんだからね。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_107<tab>Much as some enlightened types might tell you otherwise, people like to have a say in the life they lead. That's what separates us from those bugs over there.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_107見てみな……。
あそこに蜂がいるだろう？

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_108<tab>Born queens, workers, drones. Bred into roles ingrained so deeply they wouldn't know how to live otherwise. For the glory and prosperity of the hive.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_108蜂ってのは、同じ生き物でありながら、
女王蜂になる個体もいれば、兵隊蜂にも働き蜂にもなる。
本能に刻まれた役割を演じ、巣の個体すべてが協力して生きている。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_109<tab>But we've got it in us to be different. Might be born into farmin', soldierin', or politickin', but we can choose to walk a different path whenever the fancy should strike.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_109だが、人は違う。
皇帝になるヤツもいれば、軍人や農民だっているが、
生まれた家柄に左右されこそすれ、それは本能ってわけじゃない。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_110<tab>'Tain't in our nature to accept our lot without question. No, we have to believe in somethin'. Put our faith in it. Only then will we deign to march in step.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_110人が、大勢の他人と協力するには、
本能ではなく、「幻想」が必要なのさ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_111<tab>And indeed, faith of a “savage” stripe is one way to get us dancin' to the same tune. Others might be compelled through faith in logic or law. Intangible, invisible...yet cause enough for killin' and conquerin' if it suits the queen.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_111宗教や神話も、そのひとつだ。
別の国では、哲学や思想かもしれないし、法制度もそうだろう。
実体がなく人の頭の中にしかない、共通の「幻想」が必要なんだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_112<tab>“The invaders have sullied our birthright for eight centuries─no longer! We march for Locus Amoenus!” With a few righteous words, His Radiance Solus zos Galvus whipped the hive into a frenzy.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_112帝国の場合、それは歴史でありイデオロギーだった。
800年前に失った種族の故郷、ロクス・アモエヌスを奪還せよ！
初代皇帝ソルは、そう叫んで大勢を動かした。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_113<tab>Once that fire is burnin', the passion of the masses can't soon be quelled. What was once a wish for home became a holy mission to spread enlightenment. Enlightenment which would not suffer such beliefs as the beastmen held.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_113だが、故郷を取り戻しても終わらなかった。
今度は、魔導技術による先進文明を、あまねく世界の隅々まで伝え、
野蛮な宗教を信じる蛮族たちを、高みへと導け……と来たもんだ！

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_114<tab>Countless scores rendered up their lives on the altar of empire, until an entire continent was united under a single magitek fist.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_114そんな「幻想」を信じて、
幾千万の人々が命がけで戦い続け、大陸ひとつを征服した。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_115<tab>For those who still dreamed the dream of unity, a deed worthy of song. Yet some awoke to see it for the tyranny it was. My grandfather Rullus included.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_115見事なもんだが、所詮は「幻想」さ。
幻から目覚めちまえば、その向こうに真理も正義もないと気づく。
アタシの祖父ルールスも、そんな目覚めた者のひとりだった。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_116<tab>The talents of the reapers are passed down through bloodlines. Rullus was the best of us─the most accomplished and feared in the order's long history.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_116ウチは、リーパーの技を継承してきた血筋でね。
ルールスは、その当主であり、一族の長い歴史の中でも、
最強と謳われた存在だった。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_117<tab>The duty of the reapers─our role in the hive, if you will─was to deliver our countrymen from corrupt and power-hungry tyrants. When Garlemald found religion in conquest, its appetite grew to be insatiable.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_117不当な武力から同胞を救うのが、アタシらリーパーの役割だ。
だが、いつのまにかガレアン族が築き上げた帝国が、
世界を支配せんと侵略を続けている。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_118<tab>My grandfather pondered this conundrum for many sleepless nights, and came to a decision: he would relieve Solus zos Galvus of his life.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_118このジレンマに耐えかねて、祖父は決断した。
ソル・ゾス・ガルヴァスを暗殺しよう、とね……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_119<tab>Twenty years ago, he slipped into the deepest chambers of the imperial palace, silent as a shadow, until he could hear the Emperor's beatin' heart...
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_11920年前のこと……
祖父は魔導城に忍び込み、ソルを倒そうと試みた。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_120<tab>Yet when Rullus returned to me, Solus was alive and well. My grandfather, on the other hand, had a skittishness to his step, and his black hair had turned a pale white.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_120だが、敗れた……。
ほうほうの体で戻ってきた祖父は、
黒かった髪が、一夜にして白髪に変わっていたよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_121<tab>He said naught of his encounter with the Emperor, save that the most powerful man in Garlemald was no man at all.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_121戦いの様子は決して語らなかったが、ただ一言、
アレは人ではない……そう言ってたっけ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_122<tab>Shamed in his defeat, my grandfather sought greater power. Bit by bit, he gave more of himself over to the voidsent behind his avatar.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_122とにかく、祖父は、さらなる「力」を求めた。
うわ言を繰り返すように、アヴァターに「力」を求め続けたんだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_123<tab>Orcus struck when Rullus was weakest, takin' his flesh and soul in one fell swoop. When he was finished, not a mote of my grandfather remained in that body. There was only Orcus.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_123結果はお察しのとおり。
アヴァターの制御に失敗し、肉体を乗っ取られた。
オルクス誕生ってなわけだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_124<tab>The fiend flew into a rapturous frenzy, and my family were his first victims. I remember the chill of his teeth sinkin' into my flesh, gnawin' until they reached my very essence.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_124現場に居合わせた家族は、オルクスに皆殺しにされた。
アタシも例外じゃなく、抵抗虚しく倒されちまってね……。
魂を喰われたのさ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_125<tab>How am I standin' here before you, then? Oh, Orcus gorged on a soul that night. But it wasn't mine─not exactly. It was my avatar that filled his belly. Seems that was all he could stomach.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_125じゃあ、なんで生きているのか……。
それはアタシの半身とも言えるアヴァターが、
身代わりに喰われてくれたからだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_126<tab>Some might consider that a lucky twist of fate, but I had little time to ponder my fortune. Fled soon as I was able─His Radiance never looked kindly on those trying to end his life, or their families.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_126こうして、アヴァターを喪ったアタシは帝国を離れた。
なにせ皇帝暗殺犯の身内だからね。
帝国内で、そのまま暮らしていけるはずがない……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_127<tab>I wandered about for years until I settled here and started seekin' out others like me. Others who had awoken from the Empire's dream.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_127そして各地を転々とした末に、エオルゼアにたどり着き、
同じく帝国という「幻想」から目覚めちまった連中と暮らし始めた。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_128<tab>"Lemures“ is what we call the spirits of the dead in the Garlean tongue. A fittin' moniker if there ever was one. Wakin' up from a long sleep ain't unlike climbing out of the grave. I can attest to that.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_128それが「レムレース」ファミリー。
帝国語で幽霊を意味する名なんだが……
一度死んじまったアタシにゃ、似合いの名だろう？

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_129<tab>Son of a bleedin'─ Remind me not to give such long-winded speeches when the sand is blowin' in my face. I'm headin' back for some ale. See you at headquarters.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_129さて、昔話もここまでだ。
見回りも終わったことだし、オフィスに戻るかね。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_HERMIN_000_140<tab>Welcome back, Boss. How was the family?
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_HERMIN_000_140ボス、)) (( )) 02 /var>、おかえりなさい。
どうでした、みんなの様子は……？

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_141<tab>Shaken, but unharmed aside from some tussled hair and mangled verse. Orcus left one of his minions behind as a gift, but <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> made quick work of it.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_141動揺している連中も多いが、今のところ実害はなしだ。
オルクスが、配下の妖異をけしかけてきたようだが、
)) (( )) 02 /var>が倒してくれた。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_HERMIN_000_142<tab>I always said <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> was a keeper. You have an eye for the fierce of heart.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_HERMIN_000_142へぇ、流石だね。
ガレアン族でもないのに、リーパーの技を使いこなすなんて。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_HERMIN_000_143<tab>I wager <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> could slay Orcus all on <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> own. Not that we'd let <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> take all the glory.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_HERMIN_000_143)) (( )) 02 /var>とボスがいてくれれば、
オルクスなんて目じゃないね！

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_144<tab>'Course we wouldn't. We'll all be there when Orcus tries to take his prize. I don't think we'll be waitin' long, either.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_144……そうか。
案外、次の狙いは、それかもしれないな。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_145<tab>Orcus said he'd strike when <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> was ripe with fear and hatred and despair. Seasonings he's loath to forego.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_145オルクスは、)) (( )) 02 /var>の魂が狙いだ。
ヤツが言うには、恐怖と憎悪を掻き立ててから、
その魂を喰いたいらしい。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_146<tab>I've an inkling how he might try to draw out those emotions. And finish off a half-eaten meal besides...
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_DRUSILLA_000_146じゃあ、)) (( )) 02 /var>の心を揺さぶるために、
狙うべきは……

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_ORCUS_000_147<tab>Right you are, Drusilla!
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_ORCUS_000_147そう、お前だよ。
ドルシラ……！

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_ORCUS_000_148<tab>How many nights did you mourn your lost avatar? The wellspring of your power. I must say, it was quite the dish!
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_ORCUS_000_148無駄、無駄……お前には、この術は解けないさ。
アヴァターを喪っているんだろう……？
傑作だなァ……！

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_ORCUS_000_149<tab>Ah, I think not. Move so much as a finger, and her head will hit the floor.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_ORCUS_000_149おっと、動くなよォ。
手元が狂ったら、こいつの首が落ちちまう。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_ORCUS_000_150<tab>Oooh, that's it, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. That fire. I want to see it burn. I want to see it rage. I want to see the hatred seep into the depths of your soul!
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_ORCUS_000_150)) (( )) 02 /var>……
いい眼だ、そうそう、ソレだよォ。
湧き上がる憎悪と、親しき者を喪うかもしれないという恐怖……！

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_ORCUS_000_151<tab>Shall I make this Drusilla's final breath? Or this one? It is so very hard to choose!
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_ORCUS_000_151ドルシラは、あとひとつ息をした後に、
死んじまうかもしれないんだァ！

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_ORCUS_000_152<tab>I was right not to give in to my baser instincts. To allow the thought of your taste to simmer in my mind as you and Drusilla formed a bond, a...kinship, even?
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_ORCUS_000_152お前とドルシラは、出会って日が浅かったのだろう？
まだまだ互いを深くは理解できていなかったはずだァ……！
だから待ったッ！

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_ORCUS_000_153<tab>Born from an understanding of her inconsequential ideals, that you may better appreciate the bitter loss!
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_ORCUS_000_153ドルシラの正義を知り、ドルシラの勝利を願い、
ドルシラの想いに寄り添うまでッ！

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_ORCUS_000_154<tab>Hmm... But perhaps I should wait a while longer. To let the flavor of your hatred mature and the tang of your malice ripen.
target: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_ORCUS_000_154<tab>だが、あと少し……もう少しだけ熟成が必要だァ……！

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_ORCUS_000_155<tab>I can make use of Drusilla yet. Revel in her screams, exult in her misery. Ahh, how splendid it will be!
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_ORCUS_000_155だから、ドルシラを預かろう。
少しずつ限界まで、傷つけ、壊し、可愛がってやるぜェ……！

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_ORCUS_000_156<tab>All the while, my prize piglet growing fat with loathing and succulent with terror.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_ORCUS_000_156その間、)) (( )) 02 /var>、
お前は憎悪の沃土と、恐怖の清水で魂を育んでくれよォ？

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_ORCUS_000_157<tab>Patience rewards the dutiful gourmand, after all. When your tantalizing flavor has fully matured, I shall return. And I shall reap my harvest!
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_ORCUS_000_157そうして魂が熟れ、至高の味わいを帯びたとき、
俺が迎えに来てやるからなァ……！
お前の魂を刈り取るためにィ！

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_HERMIN_000_160<tab>Godsdamned voidsent bastard! Soulless piece of shite!
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_HERMIN_000_160クソッ！　クソッ！　クソッタレ！
畜生、畜生、畜生ッ！！

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_Q2_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_A2_000_001<tab>We need to think, Hermin!
target: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_A2_000_001<tab>落ち着け、ヘルミン！

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_A2_000_002<tab>Swive that sodding demon spawn!
target: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_A2_000_002<tab>オルクスを血祭りにあげるぞ！

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_A2_000_003<tab>Orcus is going to pay for this!
target: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_A2_000_003<tab>ドルシラを助け出すぞ！

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_HERMIN_000_162<tab>I know, I know... Now's not the time to lose my temper. Deep breaths, cool heads...
target: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_HERMIN_000_162<tab>す、すまない……大声を出しちまって……。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_HERMIN_000_163<tab>Aye...aye, that's the spirit!
target: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_HERMIN_000_163<tab>おう、もちろんだッ！

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_HERMIN_000_164<tab>Right. We need a plan. First things first: find out where Orcus is hiding. The rest of the family should be able to help with that.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_HERMIN_000_164今は、キレ散らかしていても、仕方ないよな……。
とにかくアタイは、ほかの構成員たちと協力して、
ボスの行方を捜してみる。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_HERMIN_000_165<tab>In the meantime, you need to prepare. I know you're good, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, but we can't leave the boss's life to chance. Sharpen your skills and your scythe, then sharpen them once more.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_HERMIN_000_165)) (( )) 02 /var>は、
あの変態野郎との決戦に備えておいてくれ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_HERMIN_000_166<tab>The boss can do naught against Orcus without her avatar. That means you'll have to do the heavy lifting.
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_HERMIN_000_166オルクスのヤツ、アヴァターを喪ったボスには、
身体を縛る術は解けないとか言っていた。
つまり、アヴァターを操るアンタなら、まともに戦えるはずなんだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_HERMIN_000_167<tab>Of course, I'll do what I can to afford you an advantage. You can count on that. For Drusilla!
target:
TEXT_AKTKBB231_04077_HERMIN_000_167もちろん、アタイも協力を惜しむつもりはないよ。
ぜったいにボスを奪還しよう……必ずだ。
